articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: India's Modi and U.S. Vice President Vance optimistic on New Delhi-Washington trade deal - CNBC
articles.description: Modi's office said the two leaders "welcomed the significant progress in the negotiations for a mutually beneficial India-U.S. Bilateral Trade Agreement."
articles.content:
India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi and U.S. Vice President JD Vance on Monday hailed the "significant" progress made in trade talks between the two sides during Vance's visit to India.
Vance, who … [+1638 chars]
